org.macquarie.philosophy.animated
Class HeadImage

java.lang.Object
  org.macquarie.philosophy.animated.HeadImage

public class HeadImage
extends java.lang.Object

A singleton class, which loads and manages a single ImageIcon object containing the "Dom's head" image to be animated.

For more information about the singleton pattern consult chapter 5 (pages 169 - 190) of the textbook "Head First Design Patterns" by Freeman, Freeman, Sierra and Bates.

Author:
Dominic Verity

Field Summary
private static java.lang.String HEAD_IMAGE_NAME
          Path to the image resource to load.
private static javax.swing.ImageIcon mInstance
          Static variable in which to store the singleton head image object.
 
Constructor Summary
private HeadImage()
          Make the default constructor private, to force clients to access the singleton instance of this class via the getInstance() method.
 
Method Summary
static javax.swing.ImageIcon getInstance()
          Return the singleton instance of this class.

Constant Field Values

mInstance

private static javax.swing.ImageIcon mInstance
Static variable in which to store the singleton head image object.

Constructor Detail

HeadImage

private HeadImage()
Make the default constructor private, to force clients to access the singleton instance of this class via the getInstance() method.

Method Detail

getInstance

public static javax.swing.ImageIcon getInstance()
Return the singleton instance of this class. This instance is constructed "lazily" the first time this method is called and is stored in the static variable mHead for re-use each subsequent time this method is called.

Returns:
the unique singleton instance of this class.
